description: Strawberry and roasted coconut make for a delicious dessert. Bake this coconut slice using fresh or frozen strawberries depending on seasonality.
name: Strawberry & Coconut Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place strawberries and cornflour in a bowl and toss until combined. Spoon over cold base, spreading evenly. Place coconut and extra sugar in a bowl. Whisk remaining egg and add to coconut mixture. Stir until well combined. Spoon evenly over strawberry mixture. Bake for 30 minutes or until topping is golden. Cool. Remove from pan. Cut into squares and serve.

Place strawberries and cornflour in a bowl and toss until combined. Spoon over cold base, spreading evenly. Place coconut and extra sugar in a bowl. Whisk remaining egg and add to coconut mixture. Stir until well combined. Spoon evenly over strawberry mixture. Bake for 30 minutes or until topping is golden. Cool. Remove from pan. Cut into squares and serve.
